title: on me by sections 10 (inserted by section 7 of the Merchant Shipping Act 2010
heading: 1. These Rules may be cited as the Merchant Shipping (Passenger Ships)
text_raw:
1. These Rules may be cited as the Merchant Shipping (Passenger Ships) 

(Amendment) Rules 2023.
text_norm: 1 rule may cited merchant shipping (passenger ships) (amendment) rule 2023

title: on me by sections 10 (inserted by section 7 of the Merchant Shipping Act 2010
heading: 2. Schedule 1 to the Merchant Shipping (Passenger Ships) Rules 2020
text_raw:
2. Schedule 1 to the Merchant Shipping (Passenger Ships) Rules 2020 
(S.I. No. 640 of 2020) is amended in the Sea Area entry entitled West Coast of 
Ireland, by substituting, for the matter in the second row in relation to 
Ballaghaline Point to Trawkeera Point, for: 

“ 

Ballaghaline 
Point to 
Trawkeera 
Point 

X 

X 

✓ 

X 

Doolin to Aran 
Islands 

” 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 the following: 

“ 

[109] 3 

Hag’s Head to 
Ballaghaline 
Point 

Ballaghaline 
Point to 
Trawkeera 
Point 

X 

X 

✓ 

X 

Doolin to Cliffs 
of Moher 

X 

X 

✓* 

X 

* Doolin to 
Inisheer from 1 
March to 31 
October 

”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 March, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [109]
text_norm: 2 schedule 1 merchant shipping (passenger ships) rule 2020 (s.i no 640 2020) amended sea area entry entitled west coast ireland substituting matter second row relation ballaghaline point trawkeera point ballaghaline point trawkeera point x x x doolin aran island notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 10th march 2023 following 109 3 hag head ballaghaline point ballaghaline point trawkeera point x x x doolin cliff moher x x x doolin inisheer 1 march 31 october  given official seal 7 march 2023 eamon ryan minister transport 4 109

title: on me by sections 10 (inserted by section 7 of the Merchant Shipping Act 2010
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Rules amend Schedule 1, Sea Areas, to the Merchant Shipping 
(Passenger Ships) Rules 2020 (S.I. No. 640 of 2020) in relation to Sea Area 
locations off the West Coast of Ireland. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [109] 5
